fields.description:
Steps To Reproduce:
1. Run test 1048 from http://wiki.appcelerator.org/display/tp/UI+Composite+Layout+Behavior+Test+Case

Actual Result:
height value is not calculated correctly

Expected Result:
height value should be 100 since view height is 200, center is 100 and bottom is 50
fields.summary: Android: CenterYPrecedence is not returning correct height value when top is not set

comments.body:
Actual Result:

view.size.height value is 100 and the red is height centered to the yellow 

Tested with Titanium SDK: 2.1.0.v20120602010244
Tested with Titanium Â Studio: 2.1.0.201206010843
Emulator - Android 2.2
Android Runtime - v8
